name: Divine Treebeast High Peryton
text:
2 Level 9 monsters
During your turn, when you activate a card or effect (Quick Effect): You can target 1 card in your GY of the same type (Monster, Spell, or Trap); attach it to this card as material. During your opponent's turn, when a card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can detach 1 material from this card of the same type (Monster, Spell, or Trap), and if you do, negate the activation, and if you do that, destroy that card. You can only use each effect of "Divine Treebeast High Peryton" once per turn.
